vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.19;
son of: Merari (H4847);
brother of: Mushi (H4187) and Jaaziah (H3269);
father of: Libni (H3845H), Eleazar (H0499J) and Kish (H7027H)
Group of mach.li (מַחְלִי "Mahli" H4249)
§ Mahlites = see Mahli "my sickness"
descendants of Mahli, the grandson of Levi
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Merarí; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Musí; tribu de Leví; (c)   descendiente de Mahli; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
抹利族 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 見 抹利 "我的病"
利未的孫子抹利的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
抹利族 这个形容词在原文的意思是 见 抹利 "我的病"
利未的孙子抹利的后裔
